OOC: oh ok....grr make me fight my own chars....

BIC:  Firestrike heard the command. "Yes, Lord Megatron" he said. 
 For a split second a look of despite came onto his face, then just 
as suddenly dissapeared.  He walked calmly to the doors.  Pulling 
out his sword blue flame covered it.  In his other hand he grabbed 
his laser rifle.  He then walked forward the doors opening.  He 
pointed the gun forward letting four shots whiz out catching 
Darkwing by surprise two in the shoulder, then two more directly in 
his forehead, snapping his neck back.  With his other hand, he 
pointed the sword at Dreadwind. The sword opened as a missile 
flew out, nailing Dreadwind in the stomach blowing him back 50 
meters.  

Darkwing had fallen to a knee grabbing his forhead, smoke seeping 
between his fingers.  He looked up the huge bot standing before 
him, who now had his gun on Darkwings head.  

"Dispose, Complete" Firestrike said.  Just then a shot rang out 
from Dreadwind as the jet flew by and over Firestrike. Firestrikes 
rifle flew out of his hand to the side, giving Darkwing a chance to 
kick out Firestrikes legs, sending him to the ground.
